--- title: DivisionIntervalos keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Recibe:" description: "Recibe:" ---
{% raw %} 
def DivisionIntervalos(a, b, epsilon):
    def f(x):
        return x**2 +54/(x+10)
    
    xm = (a+b)/2.
    L = b-a
    
    evalxm = f(xm)
    
    evalF = 1
    
    while abs(L) > epsilon:        
        x1 = a+L/4.
        x2 = b-L/4.
        evalx1 = f(x1)
        evalF += 1
        
        if evalx1 < evalxm:
            b, xm = xm, x1
            evalxm = evalx1
        else:
            # Si se evalua f(x2) hasta este punto, se ahorran varias evaluaciones al no entrar a esta parte del if
            evalx2 = f(x2)
            evalF += 1
            if evalx2 < evalxm:
                a, xm = xm, x2
                evalxm = evalx2
            else:
                a, b = x1, x2
        L = b-a
        
    sol1 = "{0:.3f}".format(a)
    sol2 = "{0:.3f}".format(b)
    print(f"({sol1},{sol2})")
    print(evalF)
{% endraw %}
